intro.p: Log4E is an Eclipse Plugin which helps you to use your logger easily in Java Projects.

The Plugin's functionality inlcudes inserting new log statement at certain method entries, replacing System.out and System.err statements with logger statements and modifies already exisiting logger statements.

p.b: It is highly recommended to check the preferences before using the Plugin the first time.

item.p: Open context menu of a Java file/Java editor or main menu and perform tasks in submenu "Log4E".
